metadata.title: CVE-2019-11756 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper refcounting of soft token session objects could cause ause-after-free and crash (likely limited to a denial of service). Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 71.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
